message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate
I'll take 60% now, let's see if you can do better next time
You think you can take 60%? I'll try to take 55% and see what happens!
You're trying to take 60%? I'll take 55% and leave you with 45% - a fair compromise?
You're getting more aggressive, I'll meet you halfway
You think meeting me halfway is a good idea? I'll try to take 57.5% and see what happens!
I'm not backing down, but I'll give you a slight edge - take it or leave it!
I'm not falling for your slight edge, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of you
You think you can squeeze more out of me? I'll try to squeeze 58% and see what happens!
I'm not backing down, but I'll give you a slight concession - take it or leave it!
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze the last bit of value out of this
You think you can squeeze the last bit out of me? I'll try to squeeze 59% and see what happens!
I'm making one last stand - take it or leave it!
You're not willing to budge, I'll take a slightly bigger share now
You think you can take advantage of me? I'll try to squeeze 59.5% and see what happens!
I'm making a final stand - this is my last offer!
No more negotiations, I'll take what I can get now
Fine, take it. I'm done negotiating.
